name: GDG Mwanza Devfest 2015
tagline: GDG Mwanza Devfest 2015 is the biggest event and the only event in Tanzania crafted for our community! Awesome speakers and lot's of fun! Full day of workshops, hands-on experience, hacking and debugging on tech about Google Product from Android , Firebase, Analytic and many more.
body:
ANDROID
The event will cover Tech talks about material design, Google Analytics, App Engine, Android Wear and Firebase
Above are the two session that will prepare developers with knowledge and skill on how they will build for the next Billion users. This will be an all day event hosted by GDG Mwanza


These event target all developers start from newbies to advanced developers and well wisher as it happens once every year try to summarize in general what best we can do with Google Technologies to improve our day to day activities, the event will open opportunity to novice and give light to what they are suppose to start to built quality apps. We intend to provide registration form to register those want to attend and the form will have some question to make sure attendees have a little understand on Google Technology.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
